title: Stanley 40 Oz (1200ML) Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated Tumbler with Straw ?Random Colors | Stanley |
description:
Stanley 40 Oz (1200ML) Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated Tumbler with Straw ? Leak-Proof Quencher Cup for Hot & Cold Beverages, Travel Mug, Gym Water Bottle, Coffee Thermos -Random Colors | Stanley |
Stay refreshed wherever you go with the Stanley 40 Oz Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated Tumbler, designed for your active lifestyle and everyday hydration needs. This durable, leak-proof travel bottle keeps your drinks hot or cold for hours, whether you're at the gym, on the road, in the office, or enjoying the outdoors.

Featuring premium stainless steel construction, this Stanley Quencher resists rust and odors while ensuring long-lasting performance. The vacuum insulation maintains the temperature of your hot coffee or ice-cold water, making it perfect for workouts, travel, or daily commutes. The included straw and ergonomic handle allow for easy, spill-free sipping, while the wide-mouth design makes cleaning and refilling effortless.

? 40 Oz (1200ML) large capacity for long-lasting hydration

? Vacuum insulated technology keeps drinks hot or cold for hours

? Leak-proof lid with straw for convenient, mess-free drinking

? Durable stainless steel body for outdoor and indoor use

? Comfortable carry handle for easy travel and gym use

? Perfect for coffee, water, smoothies, protein shakes, and iced drinks

Whether you need a gym mug, travel coffee thermos, or a daily water tumbler, the Stanley 40 Oz Tumbler is your reliable hydration companion, helping you stay energized throughout your day.
